title: Testing For Covid-19
content:
, such as a pharmacy or
health center
near you. These locations may offer NAAT, including PCR, or antigen tests, and provide low- or no-cost testing. Free NAAT or antigen tests may also be available through your
local health department
.
Talk to a doctor or healthcare provider about other testing options that may be available to you.
If you are a person with a disability, the
Disability Information and Access Line
can help you access a test or find a test location.
